name: snack vs brick
description:
Lover Pinballs is a magical love pinball game.

Level gameplay: Control the platform to catch the ball and let the two balls hit each other to pass!
Endless gameplay: Control the platform to catch the ball, and the global players are higher and lower!

- Provides level and endless 2 mode experiences.
- The control platform catches the falling ball and the ball can destroy the square.
- The ball offers 6 skins and 10 backgrounds.
- Provides a wealth of props and experiences such as increasing the ball, lengthening the platform, and making the ball bigger.
- Fits iPhonex, iPhone7, iPad and other models.
